item.description:
Reiki Appreciation Night
With Lisa and Rhys

It’s FREE!!!! Learn a new healing you have never seen before! And get a FREE Crystal Bowl CD

Are you a Reiki, student, practitioner or master? Come out tonight and feel the love!

Rhys and I would love to show all my Reiki students ( And any Reiki student) how much we think Reiki ROCKS by having a mini Reiki share and teaching you guys a new healing. It’s a Full Spectrum healing and since you have been studying Reiki, it will be a snap for you learn.

This is an amazing opportunity for you to learn from Rhys Thomas, a true energy healing master. So if you have ever been curious about what we teach in the school, or what the difference is between Reiki and Full Spectrum Healing, here is your chance to try some.

You will give a healing and get a healing!

SPECIAL BONUS!!!! This is amazing. Rhys is GIVING AWAY a copy of his beautiful Reiki Crystal Bowl CD to everyone who comes. You have heard this CD before if you have ever come to the Healer Share. It’s uplifting Crystal Bowl music that is perfect for playing when you are doing your Reiki sessions.

Tuesday, September 21st 7-9pm at Solstice. It’s FREE!

And hey, if you are aren’t a Reiki person want to come and check it out, come on down!

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: FREE Reiki Appreciation Night- Free healings and free stuff!
